hero.headline: Engineering the Future
hero.sub: Professional corporate, engineering and international solutions

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Adi and Shira lead the company with international experience in construction and architecture.
about.adiBio: Born in 1997, graduate with a diploma in Civil Engineering studies and additional courses. Years of experience in managing work and safety on construction sites. From a young age I fell in love with construction and engineering. Over the course of 10 years, I gained experience in various companies and projects, working with unique materials and acquiring understanding in all construction trades. Extensive knowledge in managing construction sites, ensuring supervision and control of all system teams and contractors. Managing projects with reliability, quality, and speed.
about.visionText: To build at the highest quality while upholding values of trust, sustainability, and innovation.

contact.title: Contact Us
